welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dayan, China! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this ancient city, known for its well-preserved architecture and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Dayan has to offer.

restaurants.name: V. Sherry Restaurant (云雪丽餐厅)
restaurants.description: V. Sherry Restaurant (云雪丽餐厅) is a yunnan restaurant located in Lijiang.
restaurants.address: 古城区七一街兴文巷108号 (祥和路), Lijiang, 云南
